data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kawai, Toshio (2013): Revision of the peristediid genus Satyrichthys (Actinopterygii: Teleostei) with the description of a new species, S. milleri sp. nov. Zootaxa 3635 (4): 419-438, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.4.5
